entry.title: Rake New_post Automatically Opens Emacs for Editing
entry.content:
I am looking for some automattions in octopress posting and deploying. The first thing is to automatically input github credential; this seems no direct way but some cia Travis CI.

Another thing is to automatically open emacs for new post. Here is the solution:

http://www.andrewboni.com/2013/08/18/octopress-and-sublimetext2/

Basically just add one line in Rakefile, and itâ€™s done.

The last thing would be automatically run rake generate and rake deploy when emacs saves the file. Not sure if emacs lisp fans have a ready answer for that.
